天の助け: (てんのたすけ) - godsend; gift from providence
天の原: (あまのはら) - the sky; the heavens
天の声: (てんのこえ) - heavenly voice; off the record instructions/influential person's opinion/powerful person's verdict
天の岩戸: (あまのいわと) - Gate of the Celestial Rock Cave
天の川銀河: (あまのかわぎんが) - Milky Way Galaxy
天の御柱: (あまのみはしら) - Ama no Mihashira; the heavenly pillar on Onokoro Island, around which Izanagi and Izanami are said to have wed
天の恵: (てんのめぐみ) - God's gift; God's blessing; grace of God; godsend
天の恵み: (てんのめぐみ) - God's gift; God's blessing; grace of God; godsend
天の浮き橋: (あまのうきはし) - Ama no Ukihashi (the heavenly floating bridge; by which gods are said to descend from the heavens to the earth)
天の浮橋: (あまのうきはし) - Ama no Ukihashi (the heavenly floating bridge; by which gods are said to descend from the heavens to the earth)
天の瓊矛: (あまのぬほこ) - Ama no Nuhoko; the heavenly jeweled spear used by Izanagi and Izanami
天の益人: (あまのますひと) - people; subjects; populace
天の羽衣: (あまのはごろも) - angel's feathered robe
天の邪鬼: (あまのじゃく) - perversity/perverse person/contrary person/contrarian; antagonistic demon in Japanese folklore; demon under the feet of temple guardian statues
天は二物を与えず: (てんはにぶつをあたえず) - (proverb) God doesn't give with both hands; God does not give two gifts; Heaven does not grant people more than one talent
天は自ら助くるものを助く: (てんはみずからたすくるものをたすく) - (proverb)  Heaven helps those who help themselves
天は自ら助くる者を助く: (てんはみずからたすくるものをたすく) - (proverb)  Heaven helps those who help themselves
天びん: (てんびん) - (balance) scales; shoulder carrying pole; steelyard
天ぷら: (テンプラ) - tempura (por: tempero, temporas); deep-fried fish and vegetables in a light batter
天を仰ぎて唾す: (てんをあおぎてつばきす) - (proverb)  harming oneself in an attempt to harm someone else; spitting at the heavens and having one's spit land back on one's face
天を摩する: (てんをまする) - to soar high (building, etc.)
天カス: (てんカス) - tenkasu; crunchy bits of deep-fried dough produced as a byproduct of cooking tempura
天一: (てんいち) - Ten'ichijin; Nakagami; god of fortune in Onmyoudou who descends to the northeast on the 46th day of the sexagenary cycle and completes a clockwise circuit, spending five days on each cardinal point and six days on each ordinal point, returning to heaven from the north on the 30th day of the next sexagenary cycle; travelling in the direction of Ten'ichijin is considered unlucky
天一天上: (てんいちてんじょう) - days on which Ten'ichijin is in heaven (the 30th to the 45th days of the sexagenary cycle)
天一太郎: (てんいちたろう) - day of Ten'ichijin's first ascension to heaven in a year (the 30th day of the first sexagenary cycle of the year)
天一神: (なかがみ) - Ten'ichijin; Nakagami; god of fortune in Onmyoudou who descends to the northeast on the 46th day of the sexagenary cycle and completes a clockwise circuit, spending five days on each cardinal point and six days on each ordinal point, returning to heaven from the north on the 30th day of the next sexagenary cycle; travelling in the direction of Ten'ichijin is considered unlucky
天上天下: (てんじょうてんげ) - (yoji) the whole world; throughout heaven and earth
天上川: (てんじょうがわ) - river raised above the surrounding land
天上界: (てんじょうかい) - celestial world; heaven
天下: (てんげ) - the whole world; the whole country; society/the public; supremacy over a nation/government of a country/the ruling power; having one's own way/doing as one pleases; peerless/incomparable/superlative/world-famous; shogun (Edo period)
天下ご免: (てんかごめん) - licensed; chartered; officially allowed; legitimate
天下の台所: (てんかのだいどころ) - The Nonpareil Kitchen; The Kitchen of the Nation (nickname for Osaka)
天下の宝刀: (てんかのほうとう) - (incorrect variant of 伝家の宝刀)  one's last resort; trump card
天下り: (あまくだり) - retiring high-ranking government officials taking a lucrative job in a private or semi-private corporation; command (from superior to inferior, government to private sector, etc.)/order/imposition; (orig. meaning) descent from heaven
天下る: (あまくだる) - to descend from heaven
天下一: (てんかいち) - unique thing; best on earth
天下一品: (てんかいっぴん) - (yoji) best article under heaven; peerless
天下万民: (てんかばんみん) - (yoji) the whole nation; all the people in the land
天下取り: (てんかとり) - rule over the whole country
天下周知: (てんかしゅうち) - (yoji) common knowledge; widely known; known to everybody
天下国家: (てんかこっか) - (yoji) the world and the nation; the state of the world; high affairs of state
天下多事: (てんかたじ) - (yoji) eventful times for the nation (world); the nation (world) being in turmoil; the storm clouds gathering in the land
天下太平: (てんかたいへい) - (yoji) peaceful and tranquil (uneventful); peace reigns over the land; halcyon times of peace
天下布武: (てんかふぶ) - (personal seal of Oda Nobunaga from 1567 onward) unify the nation by force; spread military force under the heavens
天下御免: (てんかごめん) - licensed; chartered; officially allowed; legitimate
天下晴れて: (てんかはれて) - right and proper; legal
天下泰平: (てんかたいへい) - (yoji) peaceful and tranquil (uneventful); peace reigns over the land; halcyon times of peace
天下無双: (てんかむそう) - (yoji)  peerless; unequaled; unequalled
天下無敵: (てんかむてき) - (yoji)  peerless; unequalled; unequaled
天下無類: (てんかむるい) - (yoji) peerless (unparalleled, matchless, unequaled) in the country
天下第一: (てんかだいいち) - (yoji) the best in the land; the best of its kind in the country; par excellence in the whole country
天下統一: (てんかとういつ) - (yoji) unification of the whole country
天与の資: (てんよのし) - natural endowment; natural ability
天丼: (tendon) - tempura servida sobre uma tigela de arroz; (em comédia) repetir a mesma piada ou frase boba
天井: (tenjou) - teto; preço máximo, teto de preço
天井桟敷: (てんじょうさじき) - (yoji) gallery (in a theatre); upper gallery; cheap seats; nosebleed section; the gods
天井画: (てんじょうが) - decorative ceiling painting
天井裏: (てんじょううら) - above the ceiling
天人: (あまびと) - heavenly being; celestial being; celestial nymph; celestial maiden
天人鳥: (テンニンチョウ) - pin-tailed whydah (species of weaverbird, Vidua macroura)
天仙果: (イヌビワ) - Ficus erecta (species of ficus)
天佑: (てんゆう) - divine aid; divine grace; providential help
天佑神助: (てんゆうしんじょ) - (yoji) divine grace; God's help
天体: (てんたい) - heavenly body; celestial body; astronomical object
天体写真: (てんたいしゃしん) - photograph of an astral body
天体写真術: (てんたいしゃしんじゅつ) - astrophotography

天体望遠鏡: (てんたいぼうえんきょう) - astronomical telescope
天体物理学: (てんたいぶつりがく) - astro-physics; astrophysics
天体観測: (てんたいかんそく) - astronomical observation
